website_summaries.verdict: This is a well-designed product that's built to last and is quite handsome, if the particular style fits your home decor.
pros: These are at a bargain price, but high-quality
Whether you choose the black set or the silver aluminum (with clear glass) option, you'll be taking home a classic look
cons: The hardware look is well-suited for many interior design styles but might be a bit harsh for some homes

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA and they REALLY want you to know!
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are cheap but do the job.... The only thing I do not like is the big bold "MADE IN CHINA" on top speaker shelf piece. It is right in the front right corner of the surface! It is actually IN the glass and not a ticker you can just peel off :(
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on using this on a hardwood floor and it will not work without modifications. Without using the pointed spikes or the carpet, the center bolts are too long and the preinstalled feet do not touch the floor. All the weight is sitting on the center bolts and the stand rocks left and right. If the center bolt or an 1/8" shorter it would be fine. I'm either going to have to add felt feet or cut the center bolt down and 1/8".
customer_reviews.author: airracefan

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Solution for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I think if I had bothered to read everyone else's reviews, I would not have bought this product. Like several others, I have hardwood floors and, for that reason, keep an ample supply of floor pads. Good thing, because they saved this purchase. The (wordless) instructions show the supplied plastic caps going over the spikes. Good luck with that. Even rather forceful coaxing with a rubber mallet didn't make it possible to install the caps over the spikes. Fortunately, my felt pads were just thick enough to extend the stand bottom surfaces past the connecting rods. So if you have hardwood floors and really want these particular stands, then BYOP - buy your own felt pads.
customer_reviews.author: Teravaxis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression: Beautiful and sturdy! These are very easy to assemble. Took 10 minutes. They seem very sturdy. I placed an Infinity Entra One and a smaller Polk on them and they held them without any issues whatsoever. These come with spikes or rubber protectors to place over the spikes if you don’t have carpet. They also come with sticky pads you can use to keep your speakers in place if necessary. Overall I’m very pleased with these. I wish they were a few inches shorter but that’s ok. Definitely one of the better looking affordable speaker stands on the market
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Good value, attractive speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for speaker stands for some time, as I had just been putting my speakers on a couple of stools that weren’t even the same height. The main thing holding me back was that my wife thought speaker stands would be ugly and she pooh-poohed each set I showed her. I eventually found these stands on Amazon, and they were actually acceptable to her. They were easy to put together and look very nice, and they’re also the perfect height for my bookshelf speakers. I’m very happy with them, and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: dc_x

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but tilted
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but construction is less than ideal. The two posts end up being different heights, which causes the speaker plate on top to be tilted. You can use the adjustable feet to rebalance, but then the bottom plate is tilted. The height difference is due to the thicker tube requiring a black plastic insert, which keeps tube centered, and the fact that the silver ring that seats the post is thicker than it is for the thinner post.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speaker stands to support my Klipsch bookshelf front speakers for my home theater system. I'm very happy with them. Classy look and solid construction. Assembly wasn't difficult. A nice addition to my system. I especially liked the little pointy things on the bottom of the bases that help the stands be a little more stable when sitting on carpet. However, the they might not be right for solid (e.g., hardwood) flooring. Read other reviews for buyers in this situation to see how they handled it to see if the stands are right for you. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble, Perfect Height for my Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of JBL 306P MKIIs, and did not pay attention to how big they would be. So, I purchased these speaker stands, and they fit my set up perfectly. Easy to assemble, look good. Using a little double-sided tape to insure nobody moves much in an earthquake. You can't see the stands much, but you can see what they accomplish - the speakers are above the monitor. The included carpet spikes and rubber feet can accommodate carpet or hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better service!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these stands punch above their weight. Very pleasant looking, I purposely bought them for my focal 1007be knowing that they might be too low. My listening chair is veery low and I didn't want the tweeter above my ear. Because I have them on carpet, they are are not super sturdy with the supplied spikes but it's good enough. I had a great experience with the supplier, valuemax. One of the bases originally arrived completely shattered and they very quickly fedexed me a replacement part, no questions asked. I will buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: PDNY

customer_reviews.title: look great
customer_reviews.text: Needed speaker stands for our new speakers. These were the perfect match to our new furniture and look great. The sound from our speakers is better since we moved them from the top of the console to the stands. Very happy with the look, quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: elaine Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great stands, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great stands at a great price. Was concerned about quality but these are manufactured quite well. The metal and glass look is elegant. Fits my KEF LS-50s nicely with just a bit of the stand's top plate extending beyond the speakers. When I assembled I sealed with silicone caulk and covered the wire routing holes with duct tape from the inside then filled with kitty litter. Good improvement in solidity of the stand and adds weight to prevent tipping. Hopefully also improves the sound quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Mountains

customer_reviews.title: No idea who these are for?  They are massive.
customer_reviews.text: What are these for? These are not for bookshelf speakers. And I'll be damned if anyone with a very large speaker actually tries to use these glass stands. They are very ugly, and I regret buying them. Not very sturdy, so again, I don't know who these are for.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Sleek stylish and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to put together. Sleek modern look was what I wanted and these fit that bill. Rear tone allows for speaker cable to be run to floor for a clean look. Has feet to allow for carpet as well as feet to allow for hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant...some picky points
customer_reviews.text: We weren't aware that two came in the box and it was a nice surprise. These are really quite lovely. Simple and elegant. Well made. Super easy to assemble. We liked them so much we bought two more for our Sonos speakers. My only small gripe is the "Made in China" stamp which is LARGE on the top of the table which cannot be removed. Kind of tacky. Also the rubber pads they provide for wood floors are black and not in keeping with the piece. Clear ones would be much more appropriate. I will switch them out for clear ones that I have. Again these are minor points but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: LKD

customer_reviews.title: Great stands.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a very heavy pair of speaker monitors even though the stands are rated at 15 pound maximum. My speakers are 31 pounds each but the stands handle them very well. The design will make it difficult to add sand or other weight into the tubes. They assemble in a way that the bottom plate goes on last. Also, there are cutouts for speaker wires that would need to be blocked off somehow. Overall these are great - I really like the adjustable floor spikes.
customer_reviews.author: beezageeza

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and can hold big speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice speaker stands for bigger bookshelf speakers or even to hold 2 center channel speakers for left and right channels like I have. I’m really happy with my purchase. They are the perfect height if your using center channel speakers for left and right channels.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great stands
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy, nice looking speaker stands that don't break the budget. The set I got did not have the "made in China" label that so many others have complained about, so they must have addressed that somewhere along the way. They were very easy to put together. I have slightly oversized bookshelf speakers on them - the footprint of the speakers is slightly larger than the top plate of the stand - and they work great. Nice and stable and that's on carpet using the carpet spikes on the bottom. Very happy with these and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mntnhiker

customer_reviews.title: Did the job even with heavier speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I have some old Heil ESS speakers that I still use and wanted to lift them up to ear height. Seems like most stands are made for small satellite speakers. These were not hard to assemble and took my speakers in stride. I love the rubber isolation feet on the stands.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J Molina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My original set arrived with one piece of shattered tempered glass, I requested a replacement and it arrived two days later in perfect condition! I’m happy with the stands and the seller is very fast at resolving any issues.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand, easy assembly, high-end look
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little stands, perfect for my side-surround needs. Quick, straightforward assembly. (The instructions are not stellar but the simplicity and obviousness of how the parts fit together override this shortcoming.) Very heavy glass plates at top and bottom, nicely constructed with slots for entry and exit of wire in the big up-tube. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: A bit awkward to assemble but they look nice and are sturdy platforms for small speakers. I placed Edifer Bluetooth speakers on these and they fit perfectly. Price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Oldbutfast

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A well made, easy to assemble, good looking speaker stand. Heavy thick glass and quality paint make it an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: Love this place

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Stable Speaker Stands
customer_reviews.text: These stands are at the perfect height to send sound to your ears while seated on a couch or in my recliner. Built like a Mack Truck! Great addition to my system.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Not correct components and screws
customer_reviews.text: So mad! This was junk! Didn’t come with the correct fitting components, then it rattles! How can you have a studio and have this problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Haber

customer_reviews.title: missing major part
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Missing entire bottom part of second stand.
customer_reviews.author: V.w

customer_reviews.title: Feels sassy
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tips should have come preglued onto the pointy sharp legs or at least su]argue included in pkg
customer_reviews.author: Ray Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stands
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice for the cost; the glass gives them that expensive look, and they have the weight to withstand the occasional cat jump or nudge without toppling over. They are sturdy, and if properly assembled, have no wobble. Would've like to seen some flat bottom spacer attachments if I wanted to use those in place of the carpet spikes, but that's the only feedback I have. Take note of the height, though, these are NOT tall stands.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Garvin

customer_reviews.title: A little low
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is kind of cheap. The stands work but I had to remove the larger posts and realign and retighten them as they managed to work their way out of the plastic tube guide. Despite having glass shelves top and bottom, these are fairly east to maneuver. Seems like decent quality but I've seen better. In a pinch, these will get the job done. These are pretty short overall and didn't work out for the speakers I intended to use with them.
customer_reviews.author: spin_nin

customer_reviews.title: Made in China logo is annoying, but my speakers cover them
customer_reviews.text: very decent stands. Put them together in about 10 minutes each! Made in China logo is annoying, but my speakers cover them. Would be 5 stars because of the price, however, the holes that you put the wire through leave a sharp edge that scrapes the wire as you pull it, and could potentially cut it... Overall decent for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Interstellar

customer_reviews.title: Mount- It speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased new speakers which required a larger platform and found these stands would suit my requirement. These are great looking stands with very high quality glass base and platform. The aluminum pedestals are kind of thin but that is not an issue if you do not exceed the limits. My only gripe is the "Made in China" insignia on the top platform, but your speaker will cover that. Very easy to construct. High recommendation and great value at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet
customer_reviews.text: For the price they're actually pretty nice. I'm impressed with the overall look. I would have given 5 stars but two things bug me. The packing could have been better, I had a very small chip on one of the corners and the made in China stickers are under the glass for whatever reason. The speakers cover the label so not much to gripe about. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bryan shaw

customer_reviews.title: Highly doubt it can handle 22lb as the only support ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly doubt it can handle 22lb as the only support is two rods that held both bottom and top plate However, some reviewers left comment on Made In China appeared on the top plate where you can't removed When I received mine, there was only Temper Glass label that you can't removed No big deal tho, speakers will hide them away
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of speaker stands. High quality. Solid tempered glass and aluminum supports with a hidden steel bolt connecting the top and bottom. Easy to assemble. It is definitely the best speaker stand that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Eledium

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my surround sound speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my theatre speakers for surround sound. I have them to the back of the room between chairs and they are just the right size and height level. Easy to assemble as well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Destouet

customer_reviews.title: Good Stand For The Budget Minded
customer_reviews.text: These are , by no means, stands that would satisfy the serious audiophile. The aluminum support columns are very thin walled tubes and the top and bottom platforms are glass. They are best suited for budget minded/inspired systems such as home theater or office systems. They are easy to assemble and look good. At this price point, they warrant a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The first set I ordered had a small chip in ...
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered had a small chip in one of the glass tops but Amazon had it replaced within a few days. They work perfectly for me and are just the right height and can handle way more than the 12 lb speakers I have on each one
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Rubber feet are a little wonky but work well on my hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: youtuber

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for bookshelf speakers
customer_reviews.text: Foot pegs great for carpeting. Not so great for hardwood floors. Comes with rubber cups for the spiked foot pegs. Cups don't fit spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a chip of glass broken off one of the glass bottoms. Since one of the floor spikes was stuck to the broken chip I had to modify and improvise using a felt pad as a shim and substitute for the broken chip. It's not noticeable, and does the job. However, I'm disappointed that I had to deal with this broken piece in the first place. It looks nice , but is extremely fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Affordable speaker stands forget cable management. Because u willl need to take apart to put cables in. Later
customer_reviews.author: Nohbody

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and sturdy. They come with some weird pointed metal feet that i guess would work well with carpet, but I have hardwood flooring so I didn't use them and applied little non-skid pads instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley A. Waybright

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: These stands would have been perfect for my bookshelf speakers. The tempered glass matches my TV stand and the base is wider than the top. Unfortunately, the entire set had to be returned because one of the glass panels was broken on arrival. The four glass panels are packed in plastic bags and protected only by thin layers of styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: C. N.

customer_reviews.title: they are solid and sturdy. Check your screws a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Once asembled, they are solid and sturdy. Check your screws a couple of times, once or twice, and these stands are superb. I was wishing for 12" stands, but I live in an apartment, and too close to the floor would affect my downstairs neighbor. These fit my Little Baby JBLST28s (22 pounds) perfectly. I use the ISOACOUSTICS insulators as well. Treble and Bass come through without vibration. I still use headphones for crazy loud (Ear Killing) music, but... Good stuff if it fits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Seattle

customer_reviews.title: From a distance the product looks great. However
customer_reviews.text: From a distance the product looks great. However, product arrived with both glass bases chipped (packaging was solid and undamaged) and no mounting considerations for a wooden floor (had to use my own felt pads). In tightening the rods during assembly, one of the metal base plates came unglued from the glass plate. I was able to superglue it back, but without the speaker on, you can see the ugly replacement glue. Lastly, the metal aluminum tubes holding up the speaker are not filed at the edges, so be careful running wires through them lest you scrape off the wiring insulation. All in all, an OK product, but don't look at it up close.
customer_reviews.author: DavidG

customer_reviews.title: These are some nice little stands that support my Def Tech D11's
customer_reviews.text: These are some nice little stands that support my Def Tech D11's. They are sleek, sexy, sturdy, and even have the spikes on the bottom for the carpet. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Victor D. Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Good stands, but will scratch a hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: The stands are very sturdy, heavy, and attractive. My only beef is that the provided carpet feet (with sharp points) are not optional. If these feet are left off, the stands are not stable as there are protruding screws under the base, which would cause a wobble. So the stands (with included feet) will scratch a hardwood floor or wooden table. I circumvented this by creating a small mat which I use under each stand. The manufacturer should have included a separate set of blunted feet for use on hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Cutrell

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive. Great quality. Had to buy 2 pairs for a LCR setup. Holds my Energy AC300 LCRs perfectly. Easy to put together and sturdy. My LCRs are around 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: James I. Kastner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stands. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stands. Unfortunately, had to return because they were shorter than what we needed for the space, but would love to find the same style in a 30"-32" stand. The glass and gloss black finish are very nice. The two post construction is solid and the brushed aluminum accents look great.
customer_reviews.author: RF n NC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Heavy Well Made
customer_reviews.text: find product reviews really helpful before I make a purchase, so important to write a review to help others. this is a really nice product. very easy to put together, look great and perfect height. These are very well made. there was another review mentioning a "made in china" sticker. It is so small it is barely visible and it comes right off without any residue.
customer_reviews.author: DavidCT

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good packaging, easy to mount, looks very elegant and most important do the job for a quite heavy pair of speakers. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LDC

customer_reviews.title: Take it to the Next Level
customer_reviews.text: I'm an A/V guy that enjoys both performance and how things look. I researched stands and decided on these, and bought a pair. Pictures do not do these stand justice, So I bought a second pair (easy set-up). Al V.
customer_reviews.author: 17Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in excellent condition. Well packed. Stands were a perfect fit for my Polk RTi-A3 speakers. The stands I received did not have the "Made in China" label on them. Maybe the later versions they did away with the label. Very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like all things glass, these were a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Ron NYC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: With my new sofa and this new speaker stand, what a difference it made. Very modern looks to accommodate my living room.
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: Defective parts - speaker stand can NOT be installed.
customer_reviews.text: In the box there are two defective parts - identified on assembly instructions sheet under # A4. Issue is that the thread is defective on two of them. As a result a speaker stand can NOT be installed. I would expect for the seller to send me the replacements for these two defective parts promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and striking. They are study and not likely to tip over. They do need little pads on the feet to protect a wood floor, but that is no big deal. I'll buy two more for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: A box full of shattered glass shards.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much says it all. Box was obviously re-taped and put inside another box. Packing is totally inadequate for something made of glass. Still cleaning glass shards out of my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: madwhistler

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery... assembly was a snap! ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery...assembly was a snap! It only took me 6 minutes per stand to fully assemble, and they have an expensive appearance to them, my brother in law loves the look of them...the only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 was I just wish they were a bit taller..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Needed a base for my speakers this product does the job and it looks great once assembled
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ruvalcaba

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Fits into almost any decorating motif. Sizeable speaker platform area.
customer_reviews.author: David Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: These stands were perfect for my use. They look great, they are heavy and stable and the price was very reasonable for what you get. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: W. S.

customer_reviews.title: A contemporary look
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have this stand in different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Elfie Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to force banana plug terminated speaker wire through the hidden wire slots. Very tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth the money. I placed a pair of Infinity SM-185 bookshelf speakers on mine and really sounds nice. Top glass plate is about an inch or so smaller all sides than the speaker(s) footprint but stays in place if using the "sticky pads". About the only MILD negative comment I have concerns the hidden wire "pipe". I replaced my old speaker wire with a pair of pre-soldered banana plug cables and the holes are too small to route with the banana plugs in place. You should probably "roll your own" connectors AFTER routing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Seliga

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together very nice quality. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like these stands very much. Sturdy, look nice and real easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: carsteamzn

customer_reviews.title: elegant
customer_reviews.text: Look a lot more elegant and sleek than the paint cans we had our speakers on :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremelly great.
customer_reviews.text: excellent finish, just the right height to be perfectly align to your ears. in my personal experience i test with klipsch RP160M bookshelf, and fit extraordinary well. almost perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Can't they're the best looking thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: Do their job. Can't they're the best looking thing in the world, but they're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: More stylish than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to tell what these would actually look like from the picture. However, they are more stylish than I expected. These are exactly what I was looking for, they were easy to assemble, and I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Modern design and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I place my KEF Q350 bookshelf speaker, it looking great. The middle part is not steel, called it cosmetic pvc or something. delivery is fast but seem like i got dent glass at the tip not in perfect condition thus the 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: NHN

customer_reviews.title: Good looking stands
customer_reviews.text: I have a TV and receiver on a black/glass stand in a corner and these were perfect to raise the bookshelf speakers on the side to just below the TV level. The finish looks like it belongs with the other stand and the wire management up the rear tube keeps everything neat.
customer_reviews.author: Les Mikesell

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly good product.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is typically much lighter than those much more expensive full metal body, but suprisingly very sturdy and looks impressive for its price. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMAD I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: The stands arrived on time. They are very easy to assemble and are very attractive to look at. Some readers may find them too short but I feel they're a perfect height for my surround speakers. For the money you won't be sorry for choosing these stands.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Dixon-hines

customer_reviews.title: well constructed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: These stands are outstanding, well constructed and easy to assemble. They provide the ideal match to a modern decor, fit perfectly in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Shaker

customer_reviews.title: Beauties
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and look great with the white Kef Q350's.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Create Stand
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy and the quality is good. The color and design matches nicely with my TV set. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, holds my short speakers off the floor and gives my stereo a much better sound.
customer_reviews.author: pgobeem

customer_reviews.title: When everything else is gone
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Unless you get creative and add ballast of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, matches the description
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great product, but the label of the product is permanent. It is under the glass and very visible. Not really much of a problem with a large enough or well placed speaker.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stands for my set up
customer_reviews.text: Stands worked out great for my new Paradigm speakers, just the right height and projection for what I needed in my space. No defects as some others had reported. The glass adds a bit of class to what can otherwise be a boring stand. My speakers cover the entire top of the stand, but it is a solid base and sits on hardwood flooring. Had them a few months now and happy for the price and quick delivery. Win-win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This speaker stand is not a standard height stand. READ the SPECS FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that this speaker stand reaches my knee height, I’m 6ft 3inches tall. Next time I’m buying a stand in a store and not online that doesn’t actually specify the measurements
customer_reviews.author: Khristopher Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Well built great speaker stands
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed to mount my new AR pioneer speakers. The hole to run the wire could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like them but make sure you check closely for dents ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like them but make sure you check closely for dents in the tubes. I had two sets that were both dented.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best for large stand mount speakers, but for small bookshelf speaker the stand height is a bit low.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice stands. Only problem is that the spikes are ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice stands. Only problem is that the spikes are a little hard to adjust and do not have a locking nut.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stable once assembled. Also, decently styled. You can‘t go wrong at this price. Will try to fill the hollow supports, for increased performance.

customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good for the price and look very nice. Things I wish - that they were heaver so they were more stable. Taller, these are very low to the ground.

customer_reviews.text: Really like the modern style of these stands. Very easy to assemble, glass is nice and heavy providing stability for our Klipsch speakers.

customer_reviews.text: Look rather nice, work well. Downside are the spikes on one end, those you CANNOT put on a hardwood floor at all. I have to use them upside down.

product_meta.title: Mount-It! Bookshelf and Floor Speaker Stands for Surround Sound Home Theaters, 18 Inch High, 22 Lbs Capacity, Tempered Glass and Aluminum, Clear and Silver, One Pair
feature_bullets: Pedestal speaker floor stands for your satellite or bookshelf speakers or surround sound entertainment center. Universal design compatible with Bose, Sonos, Klipsch, Polk, Samsung, JBL, Panasonic, Yamaha, and more!
Speaker Stand Dimensions: Top shelf - 7.75" x 9.75". Bottom shelf - 9.75" x 11.75". Aluminum pole - 18.25" in height
Tempered glass is a thick .5" on the top shelf for a safe, sturdy, and strong construction.
Hollowed out aluminum pole for cable management so you can hide your cables inside the pillars and out of sight
Contemporary design of clear glass and a modern silver coat on the aluminum poles. Supports 22 lb of weight for per stand. Mount-It! provides all of the necessary tools and instructions for assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars320 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
